summary: What does the perfect tweet or a viral blog post look like? When should it be posted? We'll introduce various tools for working with data in terms of collecting (requests), exploring (IPython, pandas), analyzing (NLTK, scikit-learn) and visualizing (matplotlib). In the process, we will uncover some surprising strategies for getting content shared across social media.
title: Analyzing social media data with Python
